DOC.brief_summary: In research project , investigator address incorporate physical movement preschooler help increase ability retain concept learn preschool letter , sound number recognition . Movement play important role brain . Exercise show many benefit brain help maintain clear thought , improve memory , increase activity brain , especially area involve memory , attention , language . During two week baseline data , data collect every student group letter recognition upper low case , letter sound identification , number recognition number 0-10 . The group implement movement break three-five minute schedule time stop movement . Data collect compare two group find difference academic performance .
